title: My Google Pixel 3 keeps crashing, restarting, and over heating. What can I do to resolve the issue?
content:
My phone keeps on crashing, restarting, and over heating. I haven't dropped it or gotten it wet, it just all the sudden decided to spazz and I can't use it.Additionally, when this problem started I was clicking the side button on my phone to lock it and all the sudden it starts opening the camera and then crashing, restarting...

 I already tried a factory reset to no avail.
